author: radekkapka
content:
Hey, I am pretty confident that the description of https://ethereum.github.io/eth2.0-APIs/#/Config/getDepositContract is incorrect.
> Retrieve deposit contract address and **genesis fork version**.

It's the ETH1 chain ID that we want to retrieve, right? Is this ID also called a fork version? If so, then it's a little ambiguous as it clashes with ETH2 forks.

author: mpetrunic
content: Yeah that's an error. Could you submit fix for it? ðŸ™‚

author: radekkapka
content: one more question: is it expected to return `CONFIG_NAME` from https://github.com/ethereum/eth2.0-specs/blob/v1.0.0-rc.0/configs/mainnet/phase0.yaml in https://ethereum.github.io/eth2.0-APIs/#/Config/getSpec ?

author: mpetrunic
content: I think it would make sense. It's a bit tedious to document everything but we should definitely do it at some point
